headline: Lions' playtime in Kruger national park - in pictures
text: 12.35pm BST          Hey there, will you play with me?       Oh please.       Go on, then. Are you ticklish?       Boo!       So you want to play? Well, don't look at my wrinkles       Like my Zumba move?       Now I'm jumping.       How does my mane look?       Right, we're on.       Us too. High five!       Ok, enough now. We're getting tired.
